column4: Anyone who can help me with codecs? followed the instructions at ubuntuguide.org, but there are still some media I can't see. For example viftv.no
I instalelled EasyUbuntu that gave me an option to install a sleu of codecs.
dont know if you wanted the easy way out but I took it...hehe
thanks for the advice. But for some reason it didn't do the trick. And I wanted to figure out how to do without
